title: Strengthening App Development Competencies: Energy and Systems: Deepening Concepts through Scientific Modeling and Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physics concepts (forms of energy, conservation laws) and basic proficiency in online learning tools
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can build a virtual model simulating energy conversion processes and quantitatively represent energy flow diagrams in three or more systems.
Learners can analyze the scientific validity of energy models using peer feedback and assessment rubrics, and revise/improve errors two or more times.

Learners can present explanatory models for real-world cases (e.g., solar power generation) applying concepts of energy conservation, efficiency, and entropy, and reconstruct concepts through peer discussions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
